title: Fried bananas with maple rum sauce and ice cream
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons butter or margarine', '60ml maple syrup', '4 tablespoons rum', '5 tablespoons fruit cocktail juice', '1 large lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons butter or margarine', '3 bananas, halved lengthways', '450g tinned fruit cocktail, drained and juice reserved', '6 large scoops vanilla ice cream']
